title: Anyone who knows this font? or another that looks like it?
content:
I’m searching for a font that resembles the one used in this logo:

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Afbeelding 15.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163028/http:/typophile.com/files/Afbeelding%2015.png) | 5.78 KB |

 [‹ InStyle serif font... which is it?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163028/http:/typophile.com/node/50558 "Go to previous forum topic") [True Marine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163028/http:/typophile.com/node/50556 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Idiosyn

comments.content:
The first thing that sprung to my mind was [Clearface Gothic Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163028/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=clearface+gothic+bold&x=0&y=0&sample_text=Nationale%20Loterij).

- Lex

P.S. What’s with the misplaced tittle in “Nationale”?
I made a screenshot of the vectors in illustrator, I think I didn’t group them before replacing ;) thx though for you response!
I made a screenshot of the vectors in illustrator, I think I didn’t group them before replacing ;) thx though for you response!
